name: blemish

blemish noun
(MARK)
Add to word list

[ C ] a mark on something that spoils its appearance: freckles, scars, and other minor skin blemishes

blemish noun
(FAULT)
[ C or U ] a fault in a person's character: Is any politician's record without blemish on this issue?

to spoil something: This latest revelation has seriously blemished the governor's reputation. Synonyms
deface
disfigure
flaw

Add to word list
Add to word list
a mark or fault that spoils the appearance of someone or something: Makeup can cover up your skin blemishes.
A blemish can also be a mistake or fault: Only one blemish spoiled her school record.
